page.title: 01 Introduction
page.content: Our area covers only a small part of {Weston-super-Mare.}It is however a very interesting historical area.Full of places for all the tourists to visit every year. Our area ranges from{Worlebury hill {fort}to{Marine Lake.}Worlebury hill fort used to be occupied by the iron age people. The camp used to extend right down to Birnbeck. Archeaologists have been there and discovered a human skull marked with seven sword cuts in a pit. They used to mine for lead and zinc ores. Another main attraction is{Anchor {Head.}In 1572 all the land in Anchor head was rented by Edward Baesh of Stanstead to Hugh Smyth and Mathew Smyth. They paid 4d a year to fish and hunt. {Marine Lake}is another interesting subject. In 1981 there was a storm
